main event: A civilian observer spotted a basketball-sized object with a blinking light in Pasadena, California in November 1956.
interesting points: The object had a light that blinked on for 30 seconds and then off, which lasted for 2 minutes.
The object faded in a northerly direction.
The observer believed the sighting was probably caused by a helicopter or an aircraft.
The sighting lasted for over 2 minutes.
The object was at an altitude of 5+ feet and faded out behind Mount Wilson.
sighted object: a basketball-sized object with a blinking light
